sentences.en: All bitches should be spayed unless being used for breeding.
sentences.cn: 除非是用作种犬，所有的母犬都应摘除卵巢。

sentences.en: Avoid changing a nappy unless it's dirty or very wet.
sentences.cn: 除非尿布脏了或非常湿，否则别换。

sentences.en: Don't ask me to explain unless you really don't understand.
sentences.cn: 不要叫我解释,除非你真的不懂.

sentences.en: He resolutely refused to speak English unless forced to.
sentences.cn: 除非迫不得已，否则他坚决不说英语。

sentences.en: He won’t go to sleep unless you tell him a story.
sentences.cn: 要是你不给他讲故事他就不睡觉。

sentences.en: I can’t leave her unless I know she’s all right.
sentences.cn: 除非我知道她没事，否则我不能离开她。

sentences.en: I tend to forget things unless I mark them down.
sentences.cn: 除非把事情记下来，否则我常常会忘事。

sentences.en: I think you should complain – unless, of course, you are happy with the way things are.
sentences.cn: 我觉得你应该发发牢骚——当然，除非你对现状很满意。

sentences.en: I'm not happy unless I ride or drive every day.
sentences.cn: 只有每天骑车或开车我才会开心。

sentences.en: No-one could use the computer unless they had a password.
sentences.cn: 除非知道密码，否则谁也用不了那台计算机。

sentences.en: She refused to testify, unless the murder charge against her was dropped.
sentences.cn: 除非撤销对她的谋杀指控，否则她拒绝作证。

sentences.en: Such attitudes are valueless unless they reflect inner cognition and certainty.
sentences.cn: 这种态度如果不能反映内心的认知和把握就毫无价值。

sentences.en: The South African mailboat arrived on Friday mornings unless bad weather intervened.
sentences.cn: 除非受恶劣天气干扰，南非邮船一般在星期五上午抵达。

sentences.en: The targets would not be achieved unless other departments showed equal commitment.
sentences.cn: 除非其他部门同样努力，否则这些目标无法达成。

sentences.en: Unless she loses some weight, she's had it.
sentences.cn: 除非她减点儿肥，否则她就没戏了。

sentences.en: Unless some extra money is found, the theatre will close.
sentences.cn: 要是不能找到更多资金，剧院将要关闭。

sentences.en: Unless these questions are solved, the region will remain a powder keg.
sentences.cn: 除非这些问题得到解决，否则该地区会一直是个火药桶。

sentences.en: Unless you respect other people's religions, horrible mistakes and conflict will occur.
sentences.cn: 如果不尊重别人的宗教信仰，就会祷下大错，酿成冲突。

sentences.en: Why did you need a room unless you were up to something?
sentences.cn: 除非你要搞什么小动作，不然你为什么单要一间房？

trans.tran_cn: 除非，如果不，除非在…的时候
trans.tran_en: used to say that something will happen or be true if something else does not happen or is not true
